channel.title: Menu Toolbar with EGUI or Fram_Sub_1?
channel.description:
Dear reader,
I was searching a bit and trying to figure out how to add a menu toolbar to my client, only it seems I do not have a GUI.java file, which I keep seeing over and over. Can someone give me a few pointers on maybe using Fram_Sub_1.java or (possibly EGUI.java??). I'm not sure about EGUI.java because all that is in there is the server IP. I'm using an old deltascape client version in case anyone needs to know that.
Regards, Ghostly150

item.title: Menu Toolbar with EGUI or Fram_Sub_1?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“ghostly150, post:3, topic:405179”]I don’t have JFrame.java, but thanks for responding Is there a way to use any files in a regular deltascape client to make a toolbar menu?

–

Is there anyone else that can help me? Pzezima2? Anyone? [/quote]

then write one it’s extremely simple.

Read full topic
item.source: Menu Toolbar with EGUI or Fram_Sub_1?

item.title: Menu Toolbar with EGUI or Fram_Sub_1?
item.dc:creator: @mmiillkkaa mmiillkkaa
item.description:
@mmiillkkaa wrote:

Edit Frame_Sub_1.java, that is the GUI of the client(for deltascape anyway). You could use a visual swing editor for it if you want.

Read full topic
